title: How do I delete all call records?
answer:
** Step 1 **On the dialer, touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20150430145643810001.gif)**> Clear call log**. 

** Step 2 **Touch the call records you want to delete, and touch **OK**. 
 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20150430145657358001.gif)      ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20150430145704492001.gif) 

Delete a call log:

Long press a call in the dialer, then touch Remove from call log.

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20150430145739570001.gif)     ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20150430145746355001.gif)
